LanguageData.RelicRituaryAscension_CantStartRitualRel: All the ideoligion's relics must be present and installed in reliquaries.
LanguageData.RelicRituaryAscension_GameOverRelicRitua: You've completed the ascension ceremony. The world fills with a blinding light and time seems to slow...\n\n

Your consciousness has been transported to another plane of reality.\n\nYou sense a vast, inhuman structure of infinite fractal complexity flowing into your mind. Time and scale begin to dissolve. It's terrifying. It's beautiful...
